structure.unit: ARTICLE IX. WORKFORCE HOUSING DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM ADMINISTRATION

law.catch_line: Reports to the Board of County Commissioners.

text.section:
Sec. 17-146. Reports to the Board of County Commissioners.
The Director shall submit regular reports to the Miami-Dade Board of County Commissioners concerning compliance with the provisions of this article. This report shall be provided on a semi-annual basis for the first two (2) years after the effective date of this ordinance, and annually thereafter, to include but not be limited to continuing to evaluate the need for workforce housing, the uses of and expenditures from the Affordable Housing Trust Fund, and the effectiveness of the program.
